stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains the circumstances in which Western Europe began efforts to create the transnational union that would eventually become the European Union?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of the Cold War and contemporary Europe.

choicesHtml: It was created in response to Soviet efforts to unite Eastern Europe under a single economic system.
It was an attempt to prevent a return to the political and economic instability that had characterized the first half of the twentieth century.
It was directly inspired by efforts in the nineteenth and twentieth centuries to create a unified European state.
It was envisioned as a way for European countries to maintain control of their overseas empires.
